name: Ramen Fall
description:
You must be the king of the Ramen moutain! Eat your way to your final sumo form! Defeat your mortal enemy by pushing him out of the holy ramen mountain and reclaim your throne!

Player1: Arrow Keys + right ctrl to push

Player2: AWSD + left ctrl to push

5 lives, no items, Sumo only, Ramen mountain

Sources:

https://nyamenarnia.deviantart.com/art/Japanese-Defender-Background-683368525
http://www.squishable.com/pc/opensquish_ramen_71475/fp_mini_squishables/Mini+Com...
